rules.name: Waste: zero revenue
rules.summary_template: Campaign {entity_id} has spend but zero revenue in the last 28 days.
rules.explanation_template: Spend = {spend}, revenue = 0. Consider pausing or reallocating budget.
rules.recommendation_template: Pause or reduce budget for {entity_id}; reallocate to higher-ROAS campaigns.

rules.name: ROAS decline vs baseline
rules.summary_template: Campaign {entity_id} ROAS is down >20% vs 28-day baseline.
rules.recommendation_template: Review creative and targeting for {entity_id}; consider scaling down until ROAS recovers.

rules.name: Funnel leak: low conversion rate
rules.summary_template: Entity {entity_id} has high traffic but conversion rate < 1%.
rules.recommendation_template: Audit landing page and checkout for {entity_id}; improve CRO or audience targeting.

rules.name: Scale opportunity: ROAS above baseline
rules.recommendation_template: Increase budget for {entity_id} within acceptable CAC/ROAS guardrails.
